segment.source: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates
segment.target: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates

segment.source: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates
segment.target: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates

segment.source: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates
segment.target: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates

segment.source: Before deploying the MBAM Client installation, you must download the MBAM Group Policy Templates, which contain Group Policy settings that define MBAM implementation settings for BitLocker Drive Encryption.
segment.target: Before deploying the MBAM Client installation, you must download the MBAM Group Policy Templates, which contain Group Policy settings that define MBAM implementation settings for BitLocker Drive Encryption.

segment.source: After downloading the templates, you then set the Group Policy settings to implement across your enterprise.
segment.target: After downloading the templates, you then set the Group Policy settings to implement across your enterprise.

segment.source: Downloading and deploying the MDOP Group Policy templates
segment.target: Downloading and deploying the MDOP Group Policy templates

segment.source: MDOP Group Policy templates are available for download in a self-extracting, compressed file, grouped by technology and version.
segment.target: MDOP Group Policy templates are available for download in a self-extracting, compressed file, grouped by technology and version.

segment.source: How to download and deploy the MDOP Group Policy templates
segment.target: How to download and deploy the MDOP Group Policy templates

segment.source: Download the MDOP Group Policy templates from How to Get MDOP Group Policy (.admx) Templates .
segment.target: Download the MDOP Group Policy templates from How to Get MDOP Group Policy (.admx) Templates .

segment.source: Run the downloaded file to extract the template folders.
segment.target: Run the downloaded file to extract the template folders.

segment.source: Warning
segment.target: Warning

segment.source: Do not extract the templates directly to the Group Policy deployment directory.
segment.target: Do not extract the templates directly to the Group Policy deployment directory.

segment.source: Multiple technologies and versions are bundled in this file.
segment.target: Multiple technologies and versions are bundled in this file.

segment.source: In the extracted folder, locate the technology-version .admx file.
segment.target: In the extracted folder, locate the technology-version .admx file.

segment.source: Certain MDOP technologies have multiple sets of Group Policy Objects (GPOs).
segment.target: Certain MDOP technologies have multiple sets of Group Policy Objects (GPOs).

segment.source: For example, MBAM includes MBAM Management settings and MBAM User settings.
segment.target: For example, MBAM includes MBAM Management settings and MBAM User settings.

segment.source: Locate the appropriate .adml file by language-culture (that is, en for English-United States).
segment.target: Locate the appropriate .adml file by language-culture (that is, en for English-United States).

segment.source: Copy the .admx and .adml files to a policy definition folder.
segment.target: Copy the .admx and .adml files to a policy definition folder.

segment.source: Depending on where you store the templates, you can configure Group Policy settings from the local device or from any computer on the domain.
segment.target: Depending on where you store the templates, you can configure Group Policy settings from the local device or from any computer on the domain.

segment.source: Local files.
segment.target: Local files.

segment.source: To configure Group Policy settings from the local device, copy template files to the following locations:
segment.target: To configure Group Policy settings from the local device, copy template files to the following locations:

segment.source: File type
segment.target: File type

segment.source: File location
segment.target: File location

segment.source: Group Policy template (.admx)
segment.target: Group Policy template (.admx)

segment.source: strong>policyDefinitions
segment.target: strong>policyDefinitions

segment.source: Group Policy language file (.adml)
segment.target: Group Policy language file (.adml)

segment.source: strong>policyDefinitions
segment.target: strong>policyDefinitions

segment.source: Domain central store.
segment.target: Domain central store.

segment.source: To enable Group Policy settings configuration by a Group Policy administrator from any computer on the domain, copy files to the following locations on the domain controller:
segment.target: To enable Group Policy settings configuration by a Group Policy administrator from any computer on the domain, copy files to the following locations on the domain controller:

segment.source: File type
segment.target: File type

segment.source: File location
segment.target: File location

segment.source: Group Policy template (.admx)
segment.target: Group Policy template (.admx)

segment.source: strong>sysvol\domain\policies\PolicyDefinitions
segment.target: strong>sysvol\domain\policies\PolicyDefinitions

segment.source: Group Policy language file (.adml)
segment.target: Group Policy language file (.adml)

segment.source: strong>sysvol\domain\policies\PolicyDefinitionsMUIculture]
segment.target: strong>sysvol\domain\policies\PolicyDefinitionsMUIculture]

segment.source: For example, the U.S. English ADML language-specific file will be stored in %systemroot%\sysvol\domain\policies\PolicyDefinitions\en-us.
segment.target: For example, the U.S. English ADML language-specific file will be stored in %systemroot%\sysvol\domain\policies\PolicyDefinitions\en-us.

segment.source: Edit the Group Policy settings using Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) to configure Group Policy settings for the MDOP technology.
segment.target: Edit the Group Policy settings using Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) to configure Group Policy settings for the MDOP technology.

segment.source: See Editing the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Settings for more information.
segment.target: See Editing the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Settings for more information.

segment.source: For descriptions of the Group Policy settings, see Planning for MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Requirements.
segment.target: For descriptions of the Group Policy settings, see Planning for MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Requirements.
